title: Looking for ADC Bronze/Silver and Club
body:
Hi everyone. 

I am a bronze Sup main, been playing for a few years now and am over the non ranked games.  Every time I play a ranked game I am with some new ADC and half the time we don't click.  Would be good to find an ADC that I can play regularly with, ranked and non ranked.

I am also looking for a club too. 

Add me in game:   StonedAdvantage

I really like stones....have about 420 of them.

replies.body: so you collect rocks? I'd be down to play with you. What time do you normally play?
